hero_text: You bring the knowledge, we’ll make it unforgettable.
search_placeholder: What would you like to learn?
About_Titel: Finding the Perfect Tutor is Easy
About_subtext_1: We're confident you'll find the perfect tutor, so we guarantee your first hour with any new tutor. If it's not a great match, there's no risk to you. This promise ensures you have a positive learning experience from the start. Our commitment is to your satisfaction and success. Trust us to help you find the right fit!
About_subtext_2: We’re confident you’ll find the right tutor, which is why we guarantee your first hour with any new tutor. If it doesn’t feel like the perfect match, you won’t be charged. This ensures a risk-free way to start your learning journey. Your satisfaction is our priority. Let us help you find the ideal tutor! 4o
